name: Config
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Config
description:
Instance Config

Represents a Cloud Spanner instance configuration. Instance configurations define the geographic placement of nodes and their replication.

See Google::Cloud::Spanner::Project#instance_configs and Google::Cloud::Spanner::Project#instance_config.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

instance_configs = spanner.instance_configs
instance_configs.each do |config|
  puts config.instance_config_id
end

methods.name: instance_config_id
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Config#instance_config_id
methods.description: A unique identifier for the instance configuration.

methods.name: path
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Config#path
methods.description: The full path for the instance config resource. Values are of the form projects/<project_id>/instanceConfigs/<instance_config_id>.

methods.name: name
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Instance
Config#name
methods.description: The name of this instance configuration as it appears in UIs.
